definition[0]: actions or methods that are not strong enough, and so are not effective in dealing with a difficult problem
example[0]: This is no time for half measures.
definition[1]: actions or methods that are not effective in dealing with the whole of a difficult problem
example[1]: Half measures will not fix the health care system.
definition[2]: things done to deal with a difficult situation that are not effective or firm enough
example[2]: This was no time for half measures and compromises.
